com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements

Class DeliverRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements.Requirement
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements.DeliverRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatekeepingRequirement, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class DeliverRequirement
extends Requirement
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener, StatekeepingRequirement
    Requirement specification that checks for an itemstack and removes it when it's there

      • update

        protected void update()
        Checks all involved Participants to check if the required item and quantity requirements are satisfied. Note: This does not check if the above quantity-requirement is met across all members, but instead of any single member has the required number of items. TODO fix the above noted problem
        Specified by:
        update in class Requirement
